attributes.action: Charge the Prime Minister and Chancellor of the Exchequer with Criminal Deception for levying taxes by deception on non existent anthropological global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it has been established in a British Court of Law that CO2 levels follow between 800 - 2,000 years behind corresponding fluctuations in temperature and therefore cannot be the cause, the government's claim that the taxing of CO2 emissions is necessary to reduce global temperatures is a blatant, calculated lie.

Obtaining a pecuniary advantage by deception and a conspiracy to defraud the taxpayer.

We cannot allow anyone to be above the law of the land. Criminal actions are criminal actions regardless of the public office held by the perpetrators.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
